# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to your endeavors, estimated at $1500000 to you. Our initial offer is structured to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at a price of $1200000. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful partnership. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
